snippet.title: Sonic Surge: Rhythm Showdown - Official Trailer - Upcoming Music Game
snippet.description:
Get ready to feel the beat in Sonic Surge: Rhythm Showdown! 🎸 A high-octane rhythm game where your skills and reflexes are put to the ultimate test. Featuring epic tracks, dazzling visuals, and intense head-to-head battles, this is the ultimate showdown for rhythm game enthusiasts. Are you ready to surge with the music?

🔥 Wishlist now and stay tuned for more updates!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3331390/Sonic_Surge__Rhythm_Showdown/

Join our Discord and suggest features we need to implement!
https://discord.gg/AArv7Mb2

Tags:
#SonicSurge #RhythmGame #MusicGames #CloneHero #GuitarHero #RhythmGaming #GamingTrailer #IndieGames #MusicBattle #BeatSync #GamingCommunity #RhythmShowdown
